title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Informal Online Learning

context.additional_context: A beginner-level language course optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, supporting self-directed learning during short breaks in office work

learning_goals: Learners can understand and utilize over 10 beginner-level job-related language expressions through interaction-based activities in mobile environments
Learners can select materials matching personal learning goals with over 80% accuracy using a learning content search system utilizing tags and titles
Learners can revise learning strategies based on formative assessment feedback to achieve over 20% improvement in target language skills (listening/speaking) within one week

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
